rules.text: Projects reforest lands without forest cover since 1989 and comply with national forest definitions.
Baseline biomass estimated using IPCC defaults or site-specific sampling following Tool 02.
Net anthropogenic removals equal project removals minus baseline emissions and leakage.
Activity shifting leakage quantified annually using Tool 14 and deducted from net removals.
Non-permanence risks addressed through buffer contributions per Tool 15 guidance.
Field biomass measurements conducted at least every five years using permanent plots.
Sampling uncertainty above 10% addressed with Tool 12 conservative adjustments.
Monitoring reports consolidate maps, inventory data, leakage deductions, and QA/QC evidence.
